column1: Smoque BBQ////If you are in Chicago and love BBQ you must stop here.  Line always out the door for dinner
column2: but they get you in and out very quickly.  Mac and cheese
column3: pulled pork and peach cobbler are my favorite.  Hard to eat BBQ anywhere else as we compare it to smoque.  Also another find from DDD
column4: so more for our Triple D tour in Chicago area.
